description: Configuration for MPC testing scenarios and validation

test_scenario.description: Basic test scenario settings. Options: data_source='preprocessed' (fast) or 'excel' (submission)

alpha_settings.description: Alpha (degradation price weight) settings. mode='single' uses single_alpha, mode='sweep' uses sweep_range with MetaOptimizer

meta_optimizer.description: Meta-optimizer for finding optimal alpha via ROI maximization

mpc_execution.description: Maximum MPC iterations to run. null=run full duration, integer=limit iterations for testing

output.description: Output settings. If auto_generate_run_name=true, uses format: mpc_{country}_{duration}d_alpha{alpha}. Otherwise uses custom_run_name

alpha_meta_optimization.description: Alpha meta-optimization configuration. Use with p2e_alpha_meta_optimization.py script for parameter tuning and Pareto analysis.
